mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, N.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_CODE, CATE_CODE, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "BOARD_DATE" FROM BOARD WHERE CATE_CODE = 1 AND BOARD_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_CODE DESC )N ) WHERE R BETWEEN 1 AND 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE (EMPLOYEE_NUM, ATTEND_DATE, ATTEND_VAC) SELECT EMPLOYEE_NUM, CURRENT_DATE, 0 FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE STATE =1
mapper.update: MERGE INTO ATTENDANCE USING (SELECT TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE) AS CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL) D ON (TRUNC(ATTEND_DATE) = D.CURRENT_DATE) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ATTEND_START_TIME = CURRENT_DATE WHERE TRUNC(ATTEND_DATE) = TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE) AND EMPLOYEE_NUM = 2022003 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (EMPLOYEE_NUM, ATTEND_DATE, ATTEND_START_TIME, ATTEND_VAC) VALUES (2022003, CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_DATE, 0)
